title: Every Day is Exactly the Same
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130703010905im_/http:/typophile.com/files/appearance_small_4350.jpg)

I might put this over my desk to inspire me to always push things to not be the same.
author: dragoncaller

comments.content:
NIN much?

there is no love here, and there is no pain?

Ha - there was a dark period at my old job where I was very unhappy. I decided to make a sticker and then a bookmark. Same feeling, totally different style.

Please pardon my dirty scanner.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130703010905im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Work01_4933.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130703010905im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Work02_3697.jpg)

angechilada: That is a fantastic song, isn't it??

Corey Holms: Wonderful sticker! If you don't mind, I may print it out to add to my inspiration wall. Love the bookmark as well; the text integration is beautifully done.

Email me your address and I'll mail you a copy of each.  
corey [at] coreyholms [dot] com
